title: President Donald J. Trump is Working to Promote Reliable Water Access in the West – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
October 19, 2018
We have to make sure American farmers and their families, wherever they may be, wherever they may go, have the infrastructure projects that they need to compete and grow.
						President Donald J. Trump					REDUCING REGULATORY BURDENS: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration is reducing regulatory burdens that harm reliable water access in the West. IMPROVING WATER RELIABILITY: President Trump is working to increase water reliability for families, farmers, and cities across the West. PROTECTING ENDANGERED SPECIES: The President’s memorandum will ensure a timely review process without compromising environmental protections under the Endangered Species Act.
